text: Gunther's Bubble-nest Frog or the small-eared shrub frog (Pseudophilautus microtympanum) is a frog. It lives in the hills in the middle of Sri Lanka. It lives in cloud forests. Scientists have seen it between 1555 and 2135 meters above sea level. ==References== Category:Frogs of Asia
title: Pseudophilautus microtympanum
